likeness.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the quality of being similar in appearance to someone or something
likeness.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I can see the family likeness.
Hugh’s uncanny likeness to his father
likeness.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a painting or photograph of a person, especially one that looks very like the person
likeness.translation[0].definitions[1].e: That’s a remarkable likeness of Julia.
